Text: Fall Football UpdateOnline registration will open at the associations web site wwwsbmsaorg on July rd for the Season We are looking for parents to help volunteer for field day opening day festivities and fund raising Help make the best year yet In addition we are looking for interested parents in the Northern half of the school district to help with a participation drive this sumer and fall Please visit the football section of the web site often for updates and information on the Football Season You can contact myself Michael Rupe at or our new Program Director Murphy Graham at Thanks Mike Rupe
